definition: to investigate and find out/to ascertain
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: This information may shed light on me mystery.
sentences.chinese: 這項情報可能有助於查明那件疑案。

sentences.english: The mother ship of aliens fleet have been identified.
sentences.chinese: 已查明的外國人船隊母船。

sentences.english: Causes of the sinking are still unknown.
To discover with certainty, as through examination or experimentation.
sentences.chinese: 查明，弄清由事實查明，如通過檢查或試驗。

sentences.english: To discover with certainty, as through examination or experimentation.
sentences.chinese: 查明，弄清由事實查明，如通過檢查或試驗。

sentences.english: Further field and laboratory investigations are being performed to identify the aetiology.
sentences.chinese: 正在開展進一步現場和實驗室調查以查明病因。

sentences.english: They need to model the progression of the illness so they can pinpoint drug targets.
sentences.chinese: 他們需要病情惡化的模型，使他們能夠查明藥物靶點。

sentences.english: If we can find L. L.
These reactive oxygen compounds are known to damage the body’s tissues.
sentences.chinese: 這些活性氧化合物已查明對身體組織有害。

sentences.english: Genetic sampling allows technicians to ascertain a fish's birth stream.
sentences.chinese: 基因取樣使技術人員得以查明一種魚的出生河流。

sentences.english: Without this information, an insured nonmember bank is unable to identify suspicious transactions.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有這個信息，銀行保險非黨無法查明可疑交易。

sentences.english: The chemical structure of Ligustrazine has been determined and synthetic product has been put on the market.
sentences.chinese: 其化學結構已查明，並有合成製品在市上銷售。

sentences.english: Follow-up of contacts has not identified further cases of influenza-like illness.
sentences.chinese: 對接觸者的隨訪未查明進一步流感樣疾病病例。

sentences.english: Secondly, the study also ascertained the significant differences of language learning beliefs on part of high- and low-achievers.
sentences.chinese: 研究查明瞭高分和低分學生語言學習觀念的顯著差異。

sentences.english: The court also accused Wang of selling monkeys.
sentences.chinese: 法院還查明，此前，汪還曾販賣過猴子。

sentences.english: The effect of silver-bearing tetrahedrite on the recovery ofsilver was established.
sentences.chinese: 查明瞭含銀黝銅礦對銀回收率的影響。

definition: to find out/to ascertain/to get to the bottom of/to clarify
to file for investigation/to prosecute (a case)
(of a perpetrator, victim, weapon, sum of money etc) to be involved in the case
to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to try to find out/to trace/to track down
